urls.title: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott Caught on Recording Saying Reopening Will Increase Spread of Coronavirus
urls.description: Days after enacting a plan to re-open Texas' nonessential businesses on May 1, a leaked recording appears to reveal Gov. Greg Abbott acknowledging the order...

text: @bridget_joy_ Look at all the states that are experiencing new cases of #Covid19. We opened up too soon. I am in Texas and #Abbott was recorded saying he knew it was risk to open up https://t.co/I709HxmHsc

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
